#summary How to deploy MaxTable servers on a cluster.

==Defining Machine Configuration for MaxTable==
  * Mount the DFS to your local file system
{{{
mount /dev/rbd0 /mnt/metaserver
mount /dev/rbd1 /mnt/ranger
}}}
  * Or mount the local FS to the directory /mnt
{{{
mount /dev/sda /mnt/metaserver
mount /dev/sdb /mnt/ranger
}}}
  * Configure for the client in the file config/cli.conf
{{{
metaserver=192.168.171.152
metaport=1959
}}}
  * Configure for the Master server in the file config/master.conf
{{{
port=1959
}}}
  * Configure for the Ranger server in the file config/region.conf
{{{
metaserver=192.168.171.152
metaport=1959
rangerserver=192.168.171.153
rangerport=1949
}}}
